name: Asteroids (itch) (Vulpini Templar)
description:
You've left hyperspace into an asteroid field, luckily for you your ship's blasters are more than enough to make quick work of them, unluckily for you however, your presence has upset the locals and they've sent saucers after you.

How to Play:
Bob and weave through the incoming asteroids as you shoot them to gain points, the more you destroy the higher your score, being quick enough means a higher multiplier for even more points but beware of saucers and grab power ups along the way to unleash hell and rack up an even better highscore!

Controls:
W or Up Arrow key to thrust
A/D or Left/Right Arrow keys to rotate
Space Bar to shoot

Furthermore:
This is the first time I've ever made a version of Asteroids, I wanted to keep it true to the original while giving it some extra added flare to make it stand out a little more on it's own.

Shameless Plug:
You can help out my development endeavor more directly, here!
